metadata.name: Nike 5K Training Program
metadata.description: An 8-week Audio Guided Run 5K Training Program that combines speed, endurance, recovery and motivation to get you ready to tackle a 5K.
metadata.author: Nike Run Club
prerequisites: Ability to run for at least 5 minutes continuously

weeks.name: 8 Weeks to Go
weeks.focus: Introduction to speed work and building base fitness

workouts.name: 5 Minute Recovery Run
workouts.description: Easy paced recovery run to start building your base

mainExercises.name: Recovery Run

intensity.description: 4-5 out of 10 effort. A pace easy enough that you can talk, laugh or argue freely while running.

mainExercises.notes: Use the Nike Run Club 5 Minute Run guided audio

workouts.name: First Speed Run
workouts.description: Introduction to interval training with 5K pace work

intensity.description: Easy pace to prepare for intervals

mainExercises.name: Speed Intervals

intensity.description: 7-8 out of 10 effort. The pace you could race or run hard for about 3 miles.

mainExercises.notes: 8 x 1:00 at 5K Pace with 1:00 recovery between all intervals

workouts.notes: NRC Guided Run: First Speed Run

workouts.name: 7 Minute Recovery Run
workouts.description: Recovery run to help body adapt to training stress

workouts.name: Next Speed Run
workouts.description: Progressive speed workout building to best pace

mainExercises.name: Progressive Speed Intervals
mainExercises.notes: 1:00 5K Pace, 2:00 10K Pace, 1:00 5K Pace, 2x0:45 Mile Pace, 2:00 10K Pace, 1:00 5K Pace, 0:45 Mile Pace, 0:30 Best Pace, 0:15 Best Pace with 1:00 recovery between all intervals

workouts.notes: NRC Guided Run: Next Speed Run

workouts.name: One Mile Run
workouts.description: Build endurance with your first longer run

intensity.description: Run as a progression run, starting slower than recovery pace and finishing faster

workouts.notes: NRC Guided Run: One Mile Run

weeks.notes: First week focuses on introducing speed work and building base endurance

weeks.name: 7 Weeks to Go
weeks.focus: Continued speed development and longer recovery runs

workouts.name: Ten Minute Run
workouts.notes: NRC Guided Run: Ten Minute Run

workouts.name: On the Move
workouts.description: Mixed pace intervals building speed endurance

mainExercises.name: Mixed Pace Intervals
mainExercises.notes: 0:30 Mile Pace, 1:00 5K Pace, 0:30 Mile Pace, 2:00 10K Pace, 0:30 Mile Pace, 1:00 5K Pace, 0:30 Mile Pace with 45 seconds recovery between all intervals

workouts.notes: NRC Guided Run: On the Move

workouts.name: Faster Fun
workouts.description: Progressive speed building to best effort

mainExercises.name: Progressive Speed Intervals
mainExercises.notes: 2:00 Mile Pace, 0:30 10K Pace, 1:30 Mile Pace, 0:30 10K Pace, 1:00 Mile Pace, 0:30 10K Pace, 1:00 Mile Pace, 0:30 10K Pace, 0:30 Best Pace with 30 seconds recovery between all intervals

weeks.notes: Building on week 8 with longer runs and more complex speed work

notes: This program includes Audio Guided Runs for every workout. Users can choose to run with guidance or alone. The plan is designed to be flexible and adapt to your experience level.
